hero.title: Solution EPI
hero.description: Your partner for workplace safety. Certified personal protective equipment that meets the strictest standards.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Solution Epi is a premium artisanal bakery founded on traditional baking methods and quality ingredients. Located in the heart of Douala, we pride ourselves on creating authentic breads and pastries that bring joy to our community.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Our Bakery?
cta.description: Visit our location in Douala or contact us to place a special order.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build beautiful, data-driven admin interfaces.

modern.title: Modern UI
modern.description: Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui for a sleek, responsive interface.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Easily extend and modify components to match your project's specific needs.

ai.title: AI-Powered Tools
ai.description: Integrated AI features that help automate tasks and increase productivity.

developer.title: Developer-Friendly
developer.description: Well-organized codebase with TypeScript for improved developer experience.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to start using Solution EPI.

step1.title: Set Up API
step1.description: Configure your Django REST Framework API endpoints.

step2.title: Customize UI
step2.description: Tailor the dashboard to match your requirements and brand.

step3.title: Deploy
step3.description: Deploy your application to your favorite hosting platform.

AiGenerateButton.errorParsingDescription: The AI response was not valid JSON. Please try again.
AiGenerateButton.noJsonError: No valid JSON object found in the AI response.
AiGenerateButton.dialogDescription: Describe the data you want to generate for this {modelName}. For example, 'a new user named John Doe who is a developer'.
AiGenerateButton.fullPrompt:
You are a data generation assistant for the Solution EPI platform.
Your task is to generate a complete JSON object based on a user's request and a provided model schema.
The JSON object must be valid and should not be wrapped in markdown or any other text.

User Request: "{prompt}"

Model: "{modelName}"

Instructions:
1. Analyze the user request.
2. Look at the model schema below to understand the required fields, their types, and their languages.
3. **Crucially, you must provide plausible values for ALL fields in the schema, especially for all language variations (e.g., fields ending in _en, _fr, _de , etc... it can be less or more languages).** If the user's prompt is in one language, you must translate and adapt the content for the other languages.
4. The output must be ONLY the JSON object.

Model Schema (for your reference):
{schema}

Important: Your final output must be a single, raw JSON object. Do not include any explanatory text, markdown formatting, or anything else before or after the JSON object. The response should start with '{{' and end with '}}'.

AiGenerateModal.generateDescription: Enter a prompt to generate new {modelName} using AI. The AI will attempt to create structured data based on your input.
AiGenerateModal.promptPlaceholder: e.g., A new blog post about AI in healthcare
AiGenerateModal.validationErrorMessage: Please provide a prompt and a valid number of items to generate.
AiGenerateModal.generationErrorMessage: An unexpected error occurred during AI generation.
AiGenerateModal.parsingError: Could not parse generated content into a valid object. Please check the AI response format.
AiGenerateModal.saveSuccessDescription: The item has been successfully saved.
AiGenerateModal.noDataToSave: No valid data to save for this item.

hero.title: Solution EPI
hero.description: Your partner for workplace safety. Certified personal protective equipment that meets the strictest standards.

about.title: About Solution EPI
about.description1: For over 15 years, Solution EPI has been the leader in providing personal protective equipment in Cameroon. Our mission is to ensure the safety of workers in all sectors of activity.
about.description2: We offer a complete range of certified equipment compliant with international standards, adapted to the specific needs of each industry and work environment.
about.dedicatedTeam: A team of professionals dedicated to your safety

productCategories.title: Our PPE Categories
productCategories.description: Personal protective equipment adapted to all types of occupational hazards.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Beyond equipment supply, we offer a comprehensive range of services to ensure the safety of your employees.

safetyConsulting.title: Safety Consulting
safetyConsulting.description: Risk assessment and equipment recommendations tailored to your specific work environment.

ppeTraining.title: PPE Training
ppeTraining.description: Training sessions on the correct use of personal protective equipment for your employees.

complianceAudit.title: Compliance Audit
complianceAudit.description: Verification of your equipment's compliance with current standards and regulations.

preventiveMaintenance.title: Preventive Maintenance
preventiveMaintenance.description: Regular maintenance services and verification of the condition of your protective equipment.

standards.title: Standards and Regulations
standards.description: Workplace safety is governed by strict standards. At Solution EPI, all our products comply with current international and local standards.
standards.employerMustProvidePPE: The employer must provide appropriate PPE free of charge.
standards.allProductsMeetStandards: All our products meet the most demanding international standards
items: ISO 45001 - Occupational health and safety management systems
EN 388 - Protective gloves against mechanical risks

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Need protective equipment or advice? Our team of experts is at your disposal.
contact.teamAvailable: Our team is available to answer all your questions
